CustomField.description: Job Address concatenated from opp for quote template
CustomField.formula: SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.job_location__c & " " & BR() & SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.job_city__c & ", " & SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.job_state__c & " " & BR() & SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.job_zip__c
CustomField.label: OpportunityInfo
